category: Regulations for overseas Korean sports organizations/Article 9 (Budget support and settlement)
contents: Article 9 (Budget Support and Settlement) ① Within the scope of the budget, the Sports Council shall provide for a portion of the administrative assistance costs of overseas Korean sports organizations, a portion of the expenses related to participating in national sports competitions, and the expenses incurred in holding local Korean sports competitions approved by the Sports Council. Some support may be provided. ② Overseas Korean sports organizations that have received budget support must execute the budget in compliance with the Sports Association regulations and guidelines, and must submit a business settlement statement within 60 days after the project ends.
